meanings.definition: A person who sells goods or services in a store.
meanings.sent1: The friendly salesclerk helped me find the right size.
meanings.sent2: The salesclerk at the clothing store greeted customers with a smile.
meanings.sent3: The salesclerk jokingly pretended to be a mannequin in the window display.
meanings.sent4: The salesclerk's knowledge of the products was a beacon of guidance for shoppers.
meanings.sent5: The diligent salesclerk diligently restocked the shelves with new items.

meanings.definition: To work as a salesclerk in a retail establishment.
meanings.sent1: I will salesclerk at the department store during the holiday season.
meanings.sent2: She decided to salesclerk at the boutique to gain experience.
meanings.sent3: He loves to salesclerk because he enjoys interacting with customers.
meanings.sent4: The team will salesclerk together to handle the busy weekend rush.
meanings.sent5: They plan to salesclerk efficiently to meet their sales targets.
